name: Statuspage
description: This plugin send Statuspage notifications to a Mattermost channel.

settings_schema.footer:
Use this webhook URL to set up the Statuspage integration.

`https://SITEURL/plugins/statuspage/webhook?service=NAMEOFSERVICE>&token=TOKEN`

settings.help_text: Team you want to send messages to. Use team URL, instead of a display name.
Channel you want to send messages to. Use channel URL such as 'town-square', instead of a display name. If you specify a channel that does not exist, this plugin creates a new channel with that name.
Select the username that this integration is attached to.
The token used to configure the webhook for Statuspage. The token is validates for each webhook request by the Mattermost server.
